engChrName: Welcome, friends! How good of you to come.
engSearchText: Welcome, friends! How good of you to come.
jpnChrName: やあやあ、遅かったね。
jpnSearchText: やあやあ、遅かったね。

engChrName: You sure took your sweet, sweet time. What's wrong? Lost your sense of urgency now that the countdown has stopped?
engSearchText:
You sure took your sweet, sweet time. What's wrong?
Lost your sense of urgency now that the countdown
has stopped?
jpnChrName: カウントダウンが停止してるからって ちょっとノンビリしすぎなんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
カウントダウンが停止してるからって
ちょっとノンビリしすぎなんじゃないの？

engChrName: Screw off.
engSearchText: Screw off.
jpnChrName: 抜かせ……
jpnSearchText: 抜かせ……

engChrName: I've been looking forward to beating your ass.
engSearchText: I've been looking forward to beating your ass.
jpnChrName: サド女に筋肉野郎、人形娘が マシだったとは言わねえが……
jpnSearchText:
サド女に筋肉野郎、人形娘が
マシだったとは言わねえが……

engChrName: You're going to pay for everything you've done.
engSearchText: You're going to pay for everything you've done.
jpnChrName: ……あなただけは わたしも許せません。
jpnSearchText:
……あなただけは
わたしも許せません。

engChrName: You've hurt everyone here to some extent—Risette and Feri in particular.
engSearchText:
You've hurt everyone here to some extent—Risette
and Feri in particular.
jpnChrName: そうだね…… リゼットさんの件もあるし。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね……
リゼットさんの件もあるし。

engChrName: Melchior is a criminal of the highest order.
engSearchText: Melchior is a criminal of the highest order.
jpnChrName: 私のことはともあれ── 最高ランクの重犯罪者でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
私のことはともあれ──
最高ランクの重犯罪者でしょう。

engChrName: He and Dantès have done much evil—and will likely go on to do more if we do not stop them in their tracks.
engSearchText:
He and Dantès have done much evil—and will likely
go on to do more if we do not stop them in
their tracks.
jpnChrName: ジェラール・ダンテスと共に 様々な画策をした意味では。
jpnSearchText:
ジェラール・ダンテスと共に
様々な画策をした意味では。

engChrName: ...I bet the destruction of Creil was your handiwork, too.
engSearchText:
...I bet the destruction of Creil was your
handiwork, too.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村を標的にした事。
jpnSearchText: ……クレイユ村を標的にした事。

engChrName: Even if you yourself didn't pull the trigger, you drafted the plan personally. Tell me. Am I wrong?
engSearchText:
Even if you yourself didn't pull the trigger, you
drafted the plan personally. Tell me. Am I wrong?
jpnChrName: あれは恐らく、 あなたの提案だったんですね？
jpnSearchText:
あれは恐らく、
あなたの提案だったんですね？

engChrName: Heehee. So you've been going through that reporter's belongings, hmm? Well, you almost hit the bullseye.
engSearchText:
Heehee. So you've been going through that reporter's
belongings, hmm? Well, you almost hit the bullseye.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あの記者さんの 遺品あたりから掴んだのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あの記者さんの
遺品あたりから掴んだのかな？

engChrName: I didn't merely draft the plan—I dotted the i's and crossed every t. Only I could've envisioned such a marvelously devious scheme!
engSearchText:
I didn't merely draft the plan—I dotted the i's and
crossed every t. Only I could've envisioned such a
marvelously devious scheme!
jpnChrName: ──もちろん！ 僕の判断に決まってるだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
──もちろん！
僕の判断に決まってるだろう！？

engChrName: Much to my delight, that wonderful little village was a rare model of racial harmony as well.
engSearchText:
Much to my delight, that wonderful little village was
a rare model of racial harmony as well.
jpnChrName: 幸い、東方系に中東系の住民も 仲良く暮らす珍しい村だったからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
幸い、東方系に中東系の住民も
仲良く暮らす珍しい村だったからねぇ。

engChrName: The boss was beside himself with joy when I told him of my plan. We had to deliver results to our investors—and we did so by wiping Creil off the map.
engSearchText:
The boss was beside himself with joy when I told him
of my plan. We had to deliver results to our
investors—and we did so by wiping Creil off the map.
jpnChrName: スポンサーにアピールする意味でも 格好の標的だってボスに勧めたのさ！
jpnSearchText:
スポンサーにアピールする意味でも
格好の標的だってボスに勧めたのさ！
っ……

engChrName: You evil piece of...
engSearchText: You evil piece of...
jpnChrName: 最悪ね……アンタ。
jpnSearchText: 最悪ね……アンタ。

engChrName: You know full well that those investors wouldn't have expected you to go so far.
engSearchText:
You know full well that those investors wouldn't have
expected you to go so far.
jpnChrName: ……そのスポンサー共もそこまでの 非道を考えていたわけではあるまいに。
jpnSearchText:
……そのスポンサー共もそこまでの
非道を考えていたわけではあるまいに。

engChrName: Oh, they most certainly did not. In fact, they were terrified beyond belief. Their reactions were utterly priceless!
engSearchText:
Oh, they most certainly did not. In fact, they were
terrified beyond belief. Their reactions were
utterly priceless!
jpnChrName: うん、みんな本気でビビってたから 笑わせてもらったよ♪
jpnSearchText:
うん、みんな本気でビビってたから
笑わせてもらったよ♪

engChrName: Auclair's in particular was gold. You should have seen him! He went as white as a sheet, and his voice was quavering like a little girl.
engSearchText:
Auclair's in particular was gold. You should have
seen him! He went as white as a sheet, and his voice
was quavering like a little girl.
jpnChrName: 特にオークレール社長ときたら！ 真っ青になって声も震えちゃってさ！
jpnSearchText:
特にオークレール社長ときたら！
真っ青になって声も震えちゃってさ！

engChrName: I can hardly believe the famous Beauty's Blade is his offspring. She's rather lucky she doesn't take after—
engSearchText:
I can hardly believe the famous Beauty's Blade is
his offspring. She's rather lucky she doesn't take
after—
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女》の父親らしいけど トンビが鷹を生むっていうのは……
jpnSearchText:
《剣の乙女》の父親らしいけど
トンビが鷹を生むっていうのは……

engChrName: Shut up.
engSearchText: Shut up.
jpnChrName: ──黙れ。
jpnSearchText: ──黙れ。
…………………………

engChrName: In my line of business, I deal with so-called 'bad' people on the regular. I don't discriminate as long as they've got SOME sense of right and wrong.
engSearchText:
In my line of business, I deal with so-called 'bad'
people on the regular. I don't discriminate as long as
they've got SOME sense of right and wrong.
jpnChrName: 商売柄、俺は悪人だろうが差別はしねぇ。 そこに幾許かの筋が通る限りは。
jpnSearchText:
商売柄、俺は悪人だろうが差別はしねぇ。
そこに幾許かの筋が通る限りは。

engChrName: I'm willing to take work from Heiyue, jaegers, thugs, and, hell, even the society. My door's open to 'em all.
engSearchText:
I'm willing to take work from Heiyue, jaegers, thugs,
and, hell, even the society. My door's open to 'em all.
jpnChrName: 黒月だろうが猟兵だろうが半グレだろうが、 ……気は進まないが結社だろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
黒月だろうが猟兵だろうが半グレだろうが、
……気は進まないが結社だろうがな。

engChrName: Not you, though. You're a special kind of bad.
engSearchText: Not you, though. You're a special kind of bad.
jpnChrName: だがてめえは別だ──メルキオル。
jpnSearchText: だがてめえは別だ──メルキオル。

engChrName: You didn't just cross the line—you obliterated it. Then you and your boss continued on your merry way like nothing ever happened.
engSearchText:
You didn't just cross the line—you obliterated it.
Then you and your boss continued on your merry way
like nothing ever happened.
jpnChrName: ボスのジェラールとは別の意味で 一線を踏み越えすぎた。
jpnSearchText:
ボスのジェラールとは別の意味で
一線を踏み越えすぎた。

engChrName: I know the Oathbreaker is partly to blame for how you turned out since he abandoned you and all, but frankly, I don't give a single shit about that.
engSearchText:
I know the Oathbreaker is partly to blame for how
you turned out since he abandoned you and all, but
frankly, I don't give a single shit about that.
jpnChrName: 破戒が抜けた後の《木馬團》とやらで 何があったのかもどうだっていい──
jpnSearchText:
破戒が抜けた後の《木馬團》とやらで
何があったのかもどうだっていい──

engChrName: All I care about now is sending your ass on a one-way trip to hell. I've heard enough of your goddamn voice.
engSearchText:
All I care about now is sending your ass on a one-way
trip to hell. I've heard enough of your goddamn voice.
jpnChrName: お互いやることはシンプルだ── 問答抜きで始めようぜ？
jpnSearchText:
お互いやることはシンプルだ──
問答抜きで始めようぜ？

engChrName: Whaddaya say to a one-on-one brawl?
engSearchText: Whaddaya say to a one-on-one brawl?
jpnChrName: なんなら俺一人で相手してもいい。
jpnSearchText: なんなら俺一人で相手してもいい。

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！？

engChrName: Are you serious?!
engSearchText: Are you serious?!
jpnSearchText: おい……！？

engChrName: Haha! What an amusing proposition. I assume you are planning to rely on that Grendel of yours, no?
engSearchText:
Haha! What an amusing proposition. I assume you
are planning to rely on that Grendel of yours, no?
jpnChrName: フフ、あのグレンデルとやらを 解放するつもりみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、あのグレンデルとやらを
解放するつもりみたいだけど……

engChrName: But even with that tool at your disposal, defeating me alone is too great a task for an empty shell like you.
engSearchText:
But even with that tool at your disposal, defeating me
alone is too great a task for an empty shell like you.
jpnChrName: “抜け殻”でしかない君だけじゃ 少し荷が重すぎるんじゃないかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
“抜け殻”でしかない君だけじゃ
少し荷が重すぎるんじゃないかなぁ？

engChrName: You son of a...!
engSearchText: You son of a...!
jpnSearchText: ……！　てめえ──

engChrName: (What does he mean by 'empty shell'?)
engSearchText: (What does he mean by 'empty shell'?)
jpnSearchText: （“抜け殻”……？）

engChrName: (As I feared...)
engSearchText: (As I feared...)
jpnSearchText: （……やはり………）

engChrName: I may not be privy to the finer points of your relationship to the boss, but I stumbled upon a rather enlightening detail about that very subject:
engSearchText:
I may not be privy to the finer points of your
relationship to the boss, but I stumbled upon a rather
enlightening detail about that very subject:
jpnChrName: アハハ、君とボスの関係についても 詳しくはないけど大体察しているよ！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、君とボスの関係についても
詳しくはないけど大体察しているよ！

engChrName: You were once held in one of the D∴G cult's lodges. Couple that with the knowledge that the boss was one of its high priests...
engSearchText:
You were once held in one of the D∴G cult's lodges.
Couple that with the knowledge that the boss was
one of its high priests...
jpnChrName: とある教団ロッジに囚われていた君と 幹部司祭の一人だったボスの間で──
jpnSearchText:
とある教団ロッジに囚われていた君と
幹部司祭の一人だったボスの間で──

engChrName: ...and it's easy to imagine what exactly went down between you two.
engSearchText:
...and it's easy to imagine what exactly went down
between you two.
jpnChrName: 一体“何”がやり取りされたかもね！！
jpnSearchText: 一体“何”がやり取りされたかもね！！
！！

engChrName: Ahh!
engSearchText: Ahh!
jpnChrName: ああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ……！？

jpnChrName: なあっ……！？
jpnSearchText: なあっ……！？

engChrName: H-He stabbed himself?!
engSearchText: H-He stabbed himself?!
jpnChrName: じ、自分に刃を……！？
jpnSearchText: じ、自分に刃を……！？

engChrName: W-Wait... You aren't...
engSearchText: W-Wait... You aren't...
jpnChrName: ま、まさかてめえ………
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかてめえ………

engChrName: Hahaha... *cough* Oh, but I am. ❤
engSearchText: Hahaha... *cough* Oh, but I am. ❤
jpnChrName: うふふ……ゴボ…… ……お察しの通りさ……❤
jpnSearchText:
うふふ……ゴボ……
……お察しの通りさ……❤

engChrName: If you offer up your life within Pandemonium, you will be reborn as an undead.
engSearchText:
If you offer up your life within Pandemonium, you
will be reborn as an undead.
jpnChrName: 汎魔化のプロセスで己を捧げることで ……“不死者”として生まれ変わる……
jpnSearchText:
汎魔化のプロセスで己を捧げることで
……“不死者”として生まれ変わる……

engChrName: This is eerily reminiscent of the Immortals and the Great Twilight!
engSearchText:
This is eerily reminiscent of the Immortals and the
Great Twilight!
jpnChrName: 帝国の《黄昏》でもあった……！？
jpnSearchText: 帝国の《黄昏》でもあった……！？

engChrName: So that is how Dantès still lives!
engSearchText: So that is how Dantès still lives!
jpnChrName: アルマータの首領もそれで……！
jpnSearchText: アルマータの首領もそれで……！

engChrName: Hahaha... AHAHAHAHA! Exactamundo!
engSearchText: Hahaha... AHAHAHAHA! Exactamundo!
jpnChrName: アははハハハハハ……！！ そういうことさぁアアアア！！！
jpnSearchText:
アははハハハハハ……！！
そういうことさぁアアアア！！！

engChrName: What...in the world are those markings?
engSearchText: What...in the world are those markings?
jpnChrName: ……なんて禍々しい紋様……
jpnSearchText: ……なんて禍々しい紋様……

engChrName: He's just like the others that were resurrected. No, he might be even worse!
engSearchText:
He's just like the others that were resurrected. No, he
might be even worse!
jpnChrName: 死んだ連中と同じ…… ──いやそれ以上の……！？
jpnSearchText:
死んだ連中と同じ……
──いやそれ以上の……！？

engChrName: Indeed. Their revivals were incomplete. Unlike them, I have become one with Pandemonium itself, so my power far surpasses theirs.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Their revivals were incomplete. Unlike them,
I have become one with Pandemonium itself, so my
power far surpasses theirs.
jpnChrName: ああ、彼らと違って僕のこれは完全体…… 汎魔化そのものを取り込んでいる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、彼らと違って僕のこれは完全体……
汎魔化そのものを取り込んでいる。

engChrName: It's like when I turned into the Tyrant... No, this might be even worse!
engSearchText:
It's like when I turned into the Tyrant... No, this
might be even worse!
jpnChrName: 俺が《大君》になった時の…… ──いやそれ以上か……！？
jpnSearchText:
俺が《大君》になった時の……
──いやそれ以上か……！？

engChrName: Oh, yes. I heard about that beast. If I'm not mistaken, it appeared in a similar manner forty years ago.
engSearchText:
Oh, yes. I heard about that beast. If I'm not mistaken,
it appeared in a similar manner forty years ago.
jpnChrName: ハハ、あの存在も４０年前、 似たような顕れ方をしたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、あの存在も４０年前、
似たような顕れ方をしたみたいだね。

engChrName: Though it would've been limited in what it could do. I have become one with Pandemonium itself, so I can run wild to my heart's content.
engSearchText:
Though it would've been limited in what it could do.
I have become one with Pandemonium itself, so I can
run wild to my heart's content.
jpnChrName: あくまで限定的だったらしいけど…… 僕は汎魔化そのものを取り込んでいる。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで限定的だったらしいけど……
僕は汎魔化そのものを取り込んでいる。

engChrName: Now, then. It is time for the event of the century! The prelude to the end of everything as we know it!
engSearchText:
Now, then. It is time for the event of the century!
The prelude to the end of everything as we know it!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ始めようか……♪ 世界が魔に呑み込まれる前夜祭──
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ始めようか……♪
世界が魔に呑み込まれる前夜祭──

engChrName: Before the world is devoured by darkness, I'll enjoy a most wondrous feast! I'm going to dine on your blood!
engSearchText:
Before the world is devoured by darkness, I'll
enjoy a most wondrous feast! I'm going to
dine on your blood!
jpnChrName: 血と焔をグチャグチャに掻き混ぜた クールでドープな饗宴（サバト）をさあああっ！！
jpnSearchText:
血と焔をグチャグチャに掻き混ぜた
クールでドープな饗宴（サバト）をさあああっ！！

engChrName: He's about to attack!
engSearchText: He's about to attack!
jpnChrName: っっ！　来ます！！
jpnSearchText: っっ！　来ます！！

engChrName: You are NOT taking a bite out of me!
engSearchText: You are NOT taking a bite out of me!
jpnChrName: 一人で勝手にやってなさいっ……！
jpnSearchText: 一人で勝手にやってなさいっ……！

engChrName: You bastard.
engSearchText: You bastard.
jpnChrName: 馬鹿野郎が……
jpnSearchText: 馬鹿野郎が……

engChrName: Don't let him get the upper hand! We're gonna trounce this psycho!
engSearchText:
Don't let him get the upper hand! We're
gonna trounce this psycho!
jpnChrName: ──呑み込まれんな！ 連携してブチのめすぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
──呑み込まれんな！
連携してブチのめすぞ！！

engChrName: Ugh... What's this? Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ugh... What's this? Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あれ……あはは…………
jpnSearchText: あれ……あはは…………

engChrName: Don't tell me...the fun's over already?
engSearchText: Don't tell me...the fun's over already?
jpnChrName: ひょっとして……… ………もう終わり………？
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとして………
………もう終わり………？

engChrName: Thank the Goddess for that.
engSearchText: Thank the Goddess for that.
jpnChrName: “もう”じゃねえ、 “やっと”だろうが……
jpnSearchText:
“もう”じゃねえ、
“やっと”だろうが……

engChrName: I trust you understand what happens when an undead has been vanquished?
engSearchText:
I trust you understand what happens when an undead
has been vanquished?
jpnChrName: 不死者となっての敗北…… 結末はご存じかと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
不死者となっての敗北……
結末はご存じかと思いますが……

engChrName: Time for you to accept your fate.
engSearchText: Time for you to accept your fate.
jpnChrName: ……己の罪と共に 受け入れてください。
jpnSearchText:
……己の罪と共に
受け入れてください。

engChrName: Aww... But the party had only just gotten started. What a bummer...
engSearchText:
Aww... But the party had only just gotten started.
What a bummer...
jpnChrName: あーあ、折角これからが 愉しくなるところだったのに……
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、折角これからが
愉しくなるところだったのに……

engChrName: Oh, well. The boss' plan will come to fruition all the same. He will make sure the whole world is engulfed in Pandemonium.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. The boss' plan will come to fruition all
the same. He will make sure the whole world is
engulfed in Pandemonium.
jpnChrName: でもまあいいか、ボスに任せとけば きっと広域汎魔化は完了する……
jpnSearchText:
でもまあいいか、ボスに任せとけば
きっと広域汎魔化は完了する……

engChrName: Or perhaps you will spread it in his place?
engSearchText: Or perhaps you will spread it in his place?
jpnChrName: それとも……… ……君の手によってかな……？
jpnSearchText:
それとも………
……君の手によってかな……？

engChrName: ...Hmph.
engSearchText: ...Hmph.
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ………

engChrName: What a ridiculous notion. Van would never do such a thing.
engSearchText:
What a ridiculous notion. Van would never do such
a thing.
jpnChrName: ……揺さぶっても無駄だよ。 僕たちはヴァンさんを信じている。
jpnSearchText:
……揺さぶっても無駄だよ。
僕たちはヴァンさんを信じている。

engChrName: Exactly. Whatever happens, we'll overcome this ordeal together.
engSearchText:
Exactly. Whatever happens, we'll overcome this
ordeal together.
jpnChrName: はい──何があろうと受け止めて 一緒に乗り越えるつもりですから。
jpnSearchText:
はい──何があろうと受け止めて
一緒に乗り越えるつもりですから。

engChrName: Yep. Just like we always have.
engSearchText: Yep. Just like we always have.
jpnChrName: ま、ここまで来たらね。
jpnSearchText: ま、ここまで来たらね。

engChrName: Damn, guys...
engSearchText: Damn, guys...
jpnChrName: お前ら……
jpnSearchText: お前ら……

engChrName: Haha.
engSearchText: Haha.
jpnSearchText: ……フフフ………

engChrName: How boring. This is no fun at all...
engSearchText: How boring. This is no fun at all...
jpnChrName: つまらないな…… ……それに面白くもない……
jpnSearchText:
つまらないな……
……それに面白くもない……

engChrName: Well, whatever. There's no telling what the future has in store...
engSearchText:

in store...

ダンテス幹部司祭と呼ぶべきか？
…………………………………

engChrName: And while we're at it, let me ask you somethin' else. Back in Oración, it didn't seem like you knew for sure that I was your target.
engSearchText:
And while we're at it, let me ask you somethin' else.
Back in Oración, it didn't seem like you knew for sure
that I was your target.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでやり合う直前まで “確信”は無かったようだが……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでやり合う直前まで
“確信”は無かったようだが……

engChrName: But that's changed now, hasn't it? Have you been waitin' for me specifically all this time?
engSearchText:
But that's changed now, hasn't it? Have you been
waitin' for me specifically all this time?
jpnChrName: お前が待っていたのは俺なんだろう？
jpnSearchText: お前が待っていたのは俺なんだろう？

engChrName: 'Cause from where I'm standing, it looks like all of this Pandemonium nonsense was just a ploy to draw me in.
engSearchText:
'Cause from where I'm standing, it looks like all of
this Pandemonium nonsense was just a ploy to draw
me in.
jpnChrName: それも── “汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”をエサにしてな。
jpnSearchText:
それも──
“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”をエサにしてな。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnSearchText: あ……

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnSearchText: ……それは………

engChrName: Your arrogance truly astounds me, boy.
engSearchText: Your arrogance truly astounds me, boy.
jpnChrName: 自惚れるな、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: 自惚れるな、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: Bringing you here was merely one part of my grand scheme—not the focal point.
engSearchText:
Bringing you here was merely one part of my grand
scheme—not the focal point.
jpnChrName: 確かに貴様をここへ呼び寄せるのが 目的の一つでもあるが……
jpnSearchText:
確かに貴様をここへ呼び寄せるのが
目的の一つでもあるが……

engChrName: My primary goal is—and always was—to create and spread Pandemonium throughout the world.
engSearchText:
My primary goal is—and always was—to create and
spread Pandemonium throughout the world.
jpnChrName: あくまで余興だ── 俺の目的は“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”そのもの。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで余興だ──
俺の目的は“汎魔（パンデモニウム）化”そのもの。

engChrName: My ambitions lie beyond the ruined kingdom and the fallen cult. Even Almata was simply a means to an end!
engSearchText:
My ambitions lie beyond the ruined kingdom and the
fallen cult. Even Almata was simply a means to
an end!
jpnChrName: 王国など、Ｄ∴Ｇなど、 アルマータですらどうでもいい！
jpnSearchText:
王国など、Ｄ∴Ｇなど、
アルマータですらどうでもいい！

engChrName: The day I stole this power from you, my very reason for being changed forever.
engSearchText:
The day I stole this power from you, my very reason
for being changed forever.
jpnChrName: 貴様からこの力を奪ってから 俺の在り方は根本から変わったのだ！
jpnSearchText:
貴様からこの力を奪ってから
俺の在り方は根本から変わったのだ！

engChrName: I will expose the true form of this nation, as well as this continent—a world hinged on lies.
engSearchText:
I will expose the true form of this nation, as well as
this continent—a world hinged on lies.
jpnChrName: 偽りで成り立つこの国の、大陸の、 世界の“真の姿”を曝け出すため──
jpnSearchText:
偽りで成り立つこの国の、大陸の、
世界の“真の姿”を曝け出すため──

engChrName: And I will do so by taking the form of ultimate fear.
engSearchText: And I will do so by taking the form of ultimate fear.
jpnChrName: “純粋なる恐怖”として 己を完成させるという在り方にな！
jpnSearchText:
“純粋なる恐怖”として
己を完成させるという在り方にな！
っ……！

engChrName: You're going to do what now? Wait... Hold up.
engSearchText: You're going to do what now? Wait... Hold up.
jpnChrName: どうでもいいって……！ ──ううん、そ、それよりも……！
jpnSearchText:
どうでもいいって……！
──ううん、そ、それよりも……！

engChrName: What did you mean by, 'The day I stole this power from you'?
engSearchText:
What did you mean by, 'The day I stole this power
from you'?
jpnChrName: 偽りとか真の姿とか ……ぜんぜん分かりませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
偽りとか真の姿とか
……ぜんぜん分かりませんけど……

engChrName: You saying you took something of Van's? What for...?
engSearchText: You saying you took something of Van's? What for...?
jpnChrName: ヴァンから奪った“力”…… ………まさかそいつが…………
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンから奪った“力”……
………まさかそいつが…………

engChrName: N-No way. Is that what turned the capital into Pandemonium...with the Genesis as its conduit?!
engSearchText:
N-No way. Is that what turned the capital into
Pandemonium...with the Genesis as its conduit?!
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》を通じてこの汎魔化を 引き起こしてる“元凶”ってこと！？
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》を通じてこの汎魔化を
引き起こしてる“元凶”ってこと！？

engChrName: Hahaha! Precisely!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Precisely!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、その通りだ！！
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、その通りだ！！

engChrName: It all began eleven years ago when I received a curious report from one of our lodges.
engSearchText:
It all began eleven years ago when I received a curious
report from one of our lodges.
jpnChrName: ──きっかけは１１年前だ。 ある教団支部（ロッジ）から上奏があった。
jpnSearchText:
──きっかけは１１年前だ。
ある教団支部（ロッジ）から上奏があった。

engChrName: They captured a boy who was born with a demonic element, and they were attempting to extract it—by any means necessary.
engSearchText:
They captured a boy who was born with a demonic
element, and they were attempting to extract it—by
any means necessary.
jpnChrName: “魔”の因子を宿したという少年を確保し、 それを抽出する試みをしているとな。
jpnSearchText:
“魔”の因子を宿したという少年を確保し、
それを抽出する試みをしているとな。

engChrName: The members of the D∴G cult were out of their minds. Not that I'm in a position to judge, of course...
engSearchText:
The members of the D∴G cult were out of
their minds. Not that I'm in a position to judge,
of course...
jpnChrName: 俺が言うのもなんだがＤ∴Ｇというのは とことん頭のネジが外れた集団だった。
jpnSearchText:
俺が言うのもなんだがＤ∴Ｇというのは
とことん頭のネジが外れた集団だった。

engChrName: ...but to them, no idea was taboo. Anything was fair game as long as it furthered their goal to reject the existence of the Goddess.
engSearchText:
...but to them, no idea was taboo. Anything was fair
game as long as it furthered their goal to reject the
existence of the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 女神の存在を否定するために あらゆる方法を追求して人を貶める──
jpnSearchText:
女神の存在を否定するために
あらゆる方法を追求して人を貶める──

engChrName: Nevertheless, the vast majority of their misbegotten schemes came up empty, but on occasion, they would happen upon a goldmine.
engSearchText:
Nevertheless, the vast majority of their misbegotten
schemes came up empty, but on occasion, they would
happen upon a goldmine.
jpnChrName: その多くは的外れだったが、 幾つか大当たりも引き当てていた。
jpnSearchText:
その多くは的外れだったが、
幾つか大当たりも引き当てていた。

engChrName: And their crowning achievement was finding the diabolic core that resided in the boy.
engSearchText:
And their crowning achievement was finding the
diabolic core that resided in the boy.
jpnChrName: その最たるものが、こいつが生まれながらに 持っていたという“魔核（デアボリクコア）”──
jpnSearchText:
その最たるものが、こいつが生まれながらに
持っていたという“魔核（デアボリクコア）”──

engChrName: That core possessed unspeakable power. It had no place within this realm of existence. It was a forbidden fruit that was ripe for the taking...
engSearchText:
That core possessed unspeakable power. It had no
place within this realm of existence. It was a
forbidden fruit that was ripe for the taking...
jpnChrName: この世に存在しない筈の“魔”の因子にして “力の源”を取り出す実験だったわけだ！
jpnSearchText:
この世に存在しない筈の“魔”の因子にして
“力の源”を取り出す実験だったわけだ！

engChrName: ...so naturally, I seized it. I told them to hand it over, and they couldn't very well refuse the request of Calvardian royalty—and their high priest.
engSearchText:
...so naturally, I seized it. I told them to hand it over,
and they couldn't very well refuse the request of
Calvardian royalty—and their high priest.
jpnChrName: 旧王家の末裔として幹部司祭だった俺は 献上されたそれを取り込むことを即断した。
jpnSearchText:
旧王家の末裔として幹部司祭だった俺は
献上されたそれを取り込むことを即断した。

engChrName: Before that day, I had no dreams nor ambitions to speak of. I led a hollow existence.
engSearchText:
Before that day, I had no dreams nor ambitions to
speak of. I led a hollow existence.
jpnChrName: 王国復興などどうでもいいし、長らえるために 寄生していた教団などもっとどうでもいい……
jpnSearchText:
王国復興などどうでもいいし、長らえるために
寄生していた教団などもっとどうでもいい……

engChrName: But the moment I laid eyes on that core, I instantly came alive. I was drawn to its radiant beauty, and I was sucked in by its blackened splendor.
engSearchText:
But the moment I laid eyes on that core, I instantly
came alive. I was drawn to its radiant beauty, and I
was sucked in by its blackened splendor.
jpnChrName: そんな乾いた俺を惹き付けてやまない輝きが、 その“魔核”にはあったからだ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな乾いた俺を惹き付けてやまない輝きが、
その“魔核”にはあったからだ。

engChrName: I welcomed it into my body. And then...I was reborn.
engSearchText: I welcomed it into my body. And then...I was reborn.
jpnChrName: そして──俺は文字通り“生まれ変わった”。
jpnSearchText: そして──俺は文字通り“生まれ変わった”。

engChrName: Eventually, the cult came under fire by the society, and then it was nearly annihilated by a large-scale operation led by a famous bracer.
engSearchText:
Eventually, the cult came under fire by the society,
and then it was nearly annihilated by a large-scale
operation led by a famous bracer.
jpnChrName: 《結社》による威力偵察と Ｓ級遊撃士が指揮する教団殲滅作戦……
jpnSearchText:
《結社》による威力偵察と
Ｓ級遊撃士が指揮する教団殲滅作戦……

engChrName: But I avoided the fate that befell the cult. I escaped using my newly acquired demonic power.
engSearchText:
But I avoided the fate that befell the cult. I escaped
using my newly acquired demonic power.
jpnChrName: ２つの危機を、文字通り悪魔的な力で 切り抜けた俺はマフィアへと転身し──
jpnSearchText:
２つの危機を、文字通り悪魔的な力で
切り抜けた俺はマフィアへと転身し──

engChrName: After that, I began my life anew in the mafia. I deceived Almata's witless leader with ease and put him to the sword.
engSearchText:
After that, I began my life anew in the mafia.
I deceived Almata's witless leader with ease and put
him to the sword.
jpnChrName: 小物きわまる先代を嵌めて粛清し、 アルマータという足場を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
小物きわまる先代を嵌めて粛清し、
アルマータという足場を手に入れた。

engChrName: Then I gathered minions who would do my bidding, including Melchior—who hailed from the group that was birthed by my former abode.
engSearchText:
Then I gathered minions who would do my bidding,
including Melchior—who hailed from the group that
was birthed by my former abode.
jpnChrName: “古巣”の後進である《庭園》から メルキオルを取り込んで手足も揃えてな。
jpnSearchText:
“古巣”の後進である《庭園》から
メルキオルを取り込んで手足も揃えてな。
…………………………

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、さん………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、さん………

engChrName: I had no idea those lost seven years were filled with so much trauma...
engSearchText:
I had no idea those lost seven years were filled with so
much trauma...
jpnChrName: ……空白の七年間にそんな事が……
jpnSearchText: ……空白の七年間にそんな事が……

engChrName: You had a...diabolic core inside you? What even is that?
engSearchText:
You had a...diabolic core inside you? What even
is that?
jpnChrName: その“魔核”ってのが 何なのかは分からないけど……
jpnSearchText:
その“魔核”ってのが
何なのかは分からないけど……

engChrName: You knew about this all along, didn't you?
engSearchText: You knew about this all along, didn't you?
jpnChrName: 爺さん…… アンタも知ってたんだな？
jpnSearchText:
爺さん……
アンタも知ってたんだな？

engChrName: Yes, I did. I assisted with the operation that eradicated the cult.
engSearchText:
Yes, I did. I assisted with the operation that
eradicated the cult.
jpnChrName: うむ……教団殲滅作戦の時に “裏側”で協力していた縁でな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ……教団殲滅作戦の時に
“裏側”で協力していた縁でな。

engChrName: During the mission, I chanced upon Van, who had miraculously survived—yet lost the will to live. I then treated his physical and mental wounds.
engSearchText:
During the mission, I chanced upon Van, who had
miraculously survived—yet lost the will to live. I then
treated his physical and mental wounds.
jpnChrName: 心身喪失の状態で奇跡的に生き延びた ヴァンの回復に少しばかり協力し……
jpnSearchText:
心身喪失の状態で奇跡的に生き延びた
ヴァンの回復に少しばかり協力し……

engChrName: Four years later, our paths crossed once more while he was wandering aimlessly after dropping out of school.
engSearchText:
Four years later, our paths crossed once more while he
was wandering aimlessly after dropping out of
school.
jpnChrName: その４年後──高等学校を退学し、 当て所なく彷徨うこやつと再会したわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
その４年後──高等学校を退学し、
当て所なく彷徨うこやつと再会したわけだ。

engChrName: Heh. Bet you regret bumpin' into me after all the trouble I caused you from that point on.
engSearchText:
Heh. Bet you regret bumpin' into me after all the
trouble I caused you from that point on.
jpnChrName: ハハ……あの時には師父（せんせい）に 散々迷惑を掛けちまいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……あの時には師父（せんせい）に
散々迷惑を掛けちまいましたね。

engChrName: ...You went through all that, too, Van?
engSearchText: ...You went through all that, too, Van?
jpnChrName: ……まさか……ヴァンさんも………
jpnSearchText: ……まさか……ヴァンさんも………

engChrName: Huh? 'Too'?
engSearchText: Huh? 'Too'?
jpnChrName: カ、カトルさん……？
jpnSearchText: カ、カトルさん……？

engChrName: Sorry for not comin' clean about this sooner, Quatre.
engSearchText: Sorry for not comin' clean about this sooner, Quatre.
jpnChrName: ──悪いな、カトル。 詳しい話をしてやれなくて。
jpnSearchText:
──悪いな、カトル。
詳しい話をしてやれなくて。

engChrName: You ain't like me, though. You picked yourself back up and started a new life.
engSearchText:
You ain't like me, though. You picked yourself back
up and started a new life.
jpnChrName: だがお前は俺とは違う。 とっくに立ち直れているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがお前は俺とは違う。
とっくに立ち直れているはずだ。

engChrName: You've even got a family. And a nice one, at that.
engSearchText: You've even got a family. And a nice one, at that.
jpnChrName: 大切な家族と巡り会ったことでな。
jpnSearchText: 大切な家族と巡り会ったことでな。
あ……

engChrName: You're right. I've got the professor, Essy, and Yang— who have all helped me get back on my feet.
engSearchText:
You're right. I've got the professor, Essy, and Yang—
who have all helped me get back on my feet.
jpnChrName: うん──その通りだ。 僕の家族は博士にエレ姉たち……
jpnSearchText:
うん──その通りだ。
僕の家族は博士にエレ姉たち……

engChrName: And there are others in the institute, artisanal district, and Verne whose shoulders I can lean on. I have many people whom I treasure dearly.
engSearchText:
And there are others in the institute, artisanal district,
and Verne whose shoulders I can lean on. I have
many people whom I treasure dearly.
jpnChrName: 職人街に理科大学、ヴェルヌにだって 大切な人たちが一杯いる。
jpnSearchText:
職人街に理科大学、ヴェルヌにだって
大切な人たちが一杯いる。

engChrName: But isn't that the same for you? You have many loved ones in your life who will support you however they can.
engSearchText:
But isn't that the same for you? You have many loved
ones in your life who will support you however
they can.
jpnChrName: でもそれは── ヴァンさんだって同じでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
でもそれは──
ヴァンさんだって同じでしょ？

engChrName: ...Yeah. I'm thankful for all the people who've stuck by my side.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. I'm thankful for all the people who've stuck
by my side.
jpnChrName: ………ああ、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ………ああ、そうだな。

engChrName: And I should thank you for the long-winded exposition, Dantès. Say, have you ever considered a career in film? You'd make a half-decent narrator.
engSearchText:
And I should thank you for the long-winded
exposition, Dantès. Say, have you ever considered a
career in film? You'd make a half-decent narrator.
jpnChrName: ご説明ありがとう──ジェラール、 あんたナレーターの才能があるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ご説明ありがとう──ジェラール、
あんたナレーターの才能があるぜ。

engChrName: You're lettin' those badass vocal chords go to waste. Why don't you ditch this mafia gig and shoot for a big debut on the big screen?
engSearchText:
You're lettin' those badass vocal chords go to waste.
Why don't you ditch this mafia gig and shoot for a
big debut on the big screen?
jpnChrName: マフィアなんざやってないで 改めてそっちでも目指したらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
マフィアなんざやってないで
改めてそっちでも目指したらどうだ？

engChrName: I'll even set you up with Gotti. Who knows? Maybe you'll land yourself a starring role in a sexy romance flick with Judith.
engSearchText:
I'll even set you up with Gotti. Who knows?
Maybe you'll land yourself a starring role in a sexy
romance flick with Judith.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の映画なんかお勧めだぜ。 ジュディスもお色気担当で出そうだし。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の映画なんかお勧めだぜ。
ジュディスもお色気担当で出そうだし。

engChrName: Oh, HELL no!
engSearchText: Oh, HELL no!
jpnChrName: 誰が出るかあああっ！
jpnSearchText: 誰が出るかあああっ！

engChrName: Ridiculous. I can never return to an ordinary life in this world. Nor do I have any desire to.
engSearchText:
Ridiculous. I can never return to an ordinary life in
this world. Nor do I have any desire to.
jpnChrName: 戯れ言を……こうなった俺に この世のあらゆる生き様など無縁。
jpnSearchText:
戯れ言を……こうなった俺に
この世のあらゆる生き様など無縁。

engChrName: All I want is for this meaningless chapter of existence to draw to a close...
engSearchText:
All I want is for this meaningless chapter of existence
to draw to a close...
jpnChrName: そろそろ最期の仕上げと行こうか。
jpnSearchText: そろそろ最期の仕上げと行こうか。

engChrName: ...and I will write its end myself. Come forth, Apeiron!
engSearchText:
...and I will write its end myself. Come
forth, Apeiron!
jpnChrName: 出でよ《アペイロン》── 呪われし王家が遺した聖魔の大剣よ！
jpnSearchText:
出でよ《アペイロン》──
呪われし王家が遺した聖魔の大剣よ！
……！

engChrName: What the hell is that?!
engSearchText: What the hell is that?!
jpnChrName: っ……てめえ……！
jpnSearchText: っ……てめえ……！

engChrName: That sword is covered in ominous miasma...
engSearchText: That sword is covered in ominous miasma...
jpnChrName: この瘴気は……！
jpnSearchText: この瘴気は……！

engChrName: I-It's those glyphs again!
engSearchText: I-It's those glyphs again!
jpnChrName: あ、あの紋様は……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あの紋様は……！

engChrName: So you've become an undead, too.
engSearchText: So you've become an undead, too.
jpnChrName: メルキオルと同じ“不死者”の……！
jpnSearchText: メルキオルと同じ“不死者”の……！

engChrName: That can only mean one thing: you definitely perished that day in the palace.
engSearchText:
That can only mean one thing: you definitely
perished that day in the palace.
jpnChrName: やはりあの時、間違いなく 亡くなっていたという事ですか……！
jpnSearchText:
やはりあの時、間違いなく
亡くなっていたという事ですか……！

engChrName: Indeed. And of course, this is not the Empire's curse at work.
engSearchText:
Indeed. And of course, this is not the Empire's curse
at work.
jpnChrName: クク──ああ、帝国の呪いじゃないが。
jpnSearchText: クク──ああ、帝国の呪いじゃないが。

engChrName: In order to unleash the full breadth of the diabolic core's power, I had to cast aside the shackles of mortality. So I put my plan into motion.
engSearchText:
In order to unleash the full breadth of the diabolic
core's power, I had to cast aside the shackles
of mortality. So I put my plan into motion.
jpnChrName: 取り込んだ魔核を真に解放するには “生の枷”を外す必要があったのでな。
jpnSearchText:
取り込んだ魔核を真に解放するには
“生の枷”を外す必要があったのでな。

engChrName: First, I burned Creil to the ground so that I could set the stage for the game in Oración. That village made for the perfect sacrificial lamb.
engSearchText:
First, I burned Creil to the ground so that I could set
the stage for the game in Oración. That village made
for the perfect sacrificial lamb.
jpnChrName: そのために俺はクレイユを贄とし、 オラシオンという“舞台”を整えた。
jpnSearchText:
そのために俺はクレイユを贄とし、
オラシオンという“舞台”を整えた。

engChrName: And like a lamb to the slaughter, you, Arkride—the owner of this core—heard my call, followed me into the city, and plunged your sword into my chest.
engSearchText:
And like a lamb to the slaughter, you, Arkride—the
owner of this core—heard my call, followed me into
the city, and plunged your sword into my chest.
jpnChrName: 全てはアークライド、“魔核”の 元の持ち主であるお前の手に掛かり──
jpnSearchText:
全てはアークライド、“魔核”の
元の持ち主であるお前の手に掛かり──

engChrName: Thanks to you, I have been reborn as an undead, and now I wield the power to use the Genesis to unfurl Pandemonium throughout the land!
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, I have been reborn as an undead, and
now I wield the power to use the Genesis to unfurl
Pandemonium throughout the land!
jpnChrName: 不死者となって汎魔化を齎す“力”を ゲネシスを通じてこの地で振るうために！
jpnSearchText:
不死者となって汎魔化を齎す“力”を
ゲネシスを通じてこの地で振るうために！

engChrName: H-How could you?! People's lives aren't just toys for you to play around with!
engSearchText:
H-How could you?! People's lives aren't just toys for
you to play around with!
jpnChrName: ふ、ふざけないでくださいっ！ 勝手なことばかりっ──！
jpnSearchText:
ふ、ふざけないでくださいっ！
勝手なことばかりっ──！

engChrName: You... You killed all those people and crushed their hopes and dreams for such a stupid, selfish reason?!
engSearchText:
You... You killed all those people and crushed their
hopes and dreams for such a stupid, selfish reason?!
jpnChrName: そんな……そんな事のために 多くの命と想いを踏みにじって……
jpnSearchText:
そんな……そんな事のために
多くの命と想いを踏みにじって……

engChrName: I thought Melchior was the lowest of the low, but clearly, I was wrong!
engSearchText:
I thought Melchior was the lowest of the low, but
clearly, I was wrong!
jpnChrName: メルキオルとは違う意味で…… ……やっぱアンタも最悪だわ……！
jpnSearchText:
メルキオルとは違う意味で……
……やっぱアンタも最悪だわ……！

engChrName: ...I'm sorry, Dantès.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry, Dantès.
jpnChrName: ──すまねえな。 ジェラール・ダンテス。
jpnSearchText:
──すまねえな。
ジェラール・ダンテス。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnSearchText: ……………………ア？

engChrName: I'm guessin' you weren't always quite this twisted.
engSearchText: I'm guessin' you weren't always quite this twisted.
jpnChrName: 多分、元々のアンタは そこまで歪んじゃいなかったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、元々のアンタは
そこまで歪んじゃいなかったんだろう。

engChrName: You lived a life bound by your birth, and after that, you were forced to rely on a cult of lunatics—who you wanted nothing to do with.
engSearchText:
You lived a life bound by your birth, and after that,
you were forced to rely on a cult of lunatics—who you
wanted nothing to do with.
jpnChrName: 滅びた王家のしがらみに囚われ 意に染まぬ狂気の教団に頼って……
jpnSearchText:
滅びた王家のしがらみに囚われ
意に染まぬ狂気の教団に頼って……

engChrName: ...Then your luck went up in smoke, 'cause you met me. The core inside me changed you forever.
engSearchText:
...Then your luck went up in smoke, 'cause you
met me. The core inside me changed you forever.
jpnChrName: ──そんなアンタを、俺が持っていた “魔核”が変えちまった。
jpnSearchText:
──そんなアンタを、俺が持っていた
“魔核”が変えちまった。
っ……！

engChrName: What happened to Creil, Dingo, and those who died in Oración...
engSearchText:
What happened to Creil, Dingo, and those who died
in Oración...
jpnChrName: クレイユにしてもディンゴにしても…… オラシオンで犠牲になった連中にしても。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユにしてもディンゴにしても……
オラシオンで犠牲になった連中にしても。

engChrName: ...and even Pandemonium itself...
engSearchText: ...and even Pandemonium itself...
jpnChrName: 今まさに起きている汎魔化の危機も……
jpnSearchText: 今まさに起きている汎魔化の危機も……

engChrName: ...all comes back to one troublesome punk.
engSearchText: ...all comes back to one troublesome punk.
jpnChrName: ……ま、結局そこに行き着くんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、結局そこに行き着くんだろ。

engChrName: Van, that's not...
engSearchText: Van, that's not...
jpnChrName: ヴァン、さん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、さん……

engChrName: That's bullshit, and you know it...!
engSearchText: That's bullshit, and you know it...!
jpnChrName: ……ざけんな………
jpnSearchText: ……ざけんな………

engChrName: This isn't your fault, Van!
engSearchText: This isn't your fault, Van!
jpnChrName: 違うよ…… ……ヴァンさんのせいじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
違うよ……
……ヴァンさんのせいじゃ……

engChrName: The world does not revolve around you, Van Arkride!
engSearchText: The world does not revolve around you, Van Arkride!
jpnChrName: 自惚れるな── ヴァン・アークライド！！
jpnSearchText:
自惚れるな──
ヴァン・アークライド！！

engChrName: I have walked this path of my own free will—and every choice I've made has been mine and mine alone.
engSearchText:
I have walked this path of my own free will—and
every choice I've made has been mine and mine alone.
jpnChrName: この俺の在り方も汎魔化も！ 俺自身が選び、成し遂げてきた事！
jpnSearchText:
この俺の在り方も汎魔化も！
俺自身が選び、成し遂げてきた事！

engChrName: How DARE you imply otherwise?
engSearchText: How DARE you imply otherwise?
jpnChrName: 貴様から奪った“魔核”に 左右されたのでは断じてない……！
jpnSearchText:
貴様から奪った“魔核”に
左右されたのでは断じてない……！

engChrName: I will not stand to be pitied by the likes of you!
engSearchText: I will not stand to be pitied by the likes of you!
jpnChrName: ましてや貴様ごときに 憐れまれる筋合いもな……！
jpnSearchText:
ましてや貴様ごときに
憐れまれる筋合いもな……！

engChrName: Heheh. Once you finally breathe your last, the final factor will be unleashed...
engSearchText:
Heheh. Once you finally breathe your last, the final
factor will be unleashed...
jpnChrName: クク、元の宿主たる貴様を倒せば 最後の“因子”が解放される……
jpnSearchText:
クク、元の宿主たる貴様を倒せば
最後の“因子”が解放される……

engChrName: ...and then the diabolic core that dwells within me will become whole and return to its true form!
engSearchText:
...and then the diabolic core that dwells within me
will become whole and return to its true form!
jpnChrName: そうすれば俺の中の《魔核》は 完全となって真の姿を取り戻すだろう！
jpnSearchText:
そうすれば俺の中の《魔核》は
完全となって真の姿を取り戻すだろう！

engChrName: At long last, you will finally be mine, empty husk!
engSearchText: At long last, you will finally be mine, empty husk!
jpnChrName: 喰らわせてもらうぞ──“抜け殻”！！
jpnSearchText: 喰らわせてもらうぞ──“抜け殻”！！

engChrName: Not if we have anything to say about it!
engSearchText: Not if we have anything to say about it!
jpnChrName: っ……させません！！
jpnSearchText: っ……させません！！

engChrName: The crap that's coming outta your mouth is as dumb as your hair, asshole!
engSearchText:
The crap that's coming outta your mouth is as dumb
as your hair, asshole!
jpnChrName: ふざけんじゃねえぞ、 このオールバック野郎が……！
jpnSearchText:
ふざけんじゃねえぞ、
このオールバック野郎が……！

engChrName: We cannot and will not overlook what you are saying about Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
We cannot and will not overlook what you are saying
about Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……先ほどから聞いていれば 看過できぬ言葉ばかり。
jpnSearchText:
……先ほどから聞いていれば
看過できぬ言葉ばかり。

engChrName: You take those words back!
engSearchText: You take those words back!
jpnChrName: 訂正してもらいます……！
jpnSearchText: 訂正してもらいます……！

engChrName: I won't stand for you calling Van an empty husk. He's a wonderful human being. And he's someone who is dear to us all!
engSearchText:
I won't stand for you calling Van an empty husk.
He's a wonderful human being. And he's someone
who is dear to us all!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんは──私たちの大切な人は 抜け殻なんかじゃありません……！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんは──私たちの大切な人は
抜け殻なんかじゃありません……！
……っ。

engChrName: Now that I know you're beyond saving, I can take comfort in finishing you off one last time.
engSearchText:
Now that I know you're beyond saving, I can take
comfort in finishing you off one last time.
jpnChrName: ──なら俺は歪んじまったアンタに もう一度だけ引導を渡してやる。
jpnSearchText:
──なら俺は歪んじまったアンタに
もう一度だけ引導を渡してやる。

engChrName: And I'm not just doing that to get my core back. It's a spriggan's job to take out power-hungry bastards when no one else can!
engSearchText:
And I'm not just doing that to get my core back. It's a
spriggan's job to take out power-hungry bastards
when no one else can!
jpnChrName: “魔核”の元の持ち主としてじゃなく…… 裏解決屋としての流儀を貫くためにな！
jpnSearchText:
“魔核”の元の持ち主としてじゃなく……
裏解決屋としての流儀を貫くためにな！

engChrName: Hahaha! How amusing. I look forward to seeing you try!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! How amusing. I look forward to seeing
you try!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、いいだろう！ それでは死ね──裏解決屋（スプリガン）！！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、いいだろう！
それでは死ね──裏解決屋（スプリガン）！！

engChrName: Is he...resonating with Mr. Arkride...?
engSearchText: Is he...resonating with Mr. Arkride...?
jpnChrName: こ、これは…… ヴァン様と共鳴して……！？
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは……
ヴァン様と共鳴して……！？

engChrName: So that is the diabolic core...
engSearchText: So that is the diabolic core...
jpnChrName: あれが《魔核（デアボリクコア）》か──！
jpnSearchText: あれが《魔核（デアボリクコア）》か──！

engChrName: Hahaha! Looks like my theory proved true! The core will soon be made whole once again!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! Looks like my theory proved true! The core
will soon be made whole once again!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、睨んだ通りだ！ 貴様と共鳴して完全となり始めたぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、睨んだ通りだ！
貴様と共鳴して完全となり始めたぞ！？

engChrName: Though I'm afraid my curiosity is getting the better of me. I think I will perform an early test run.
engSearchText:
Though I'm afraid my curiosity is getting the better
of me. I think I will perform an early test run.
jpnChrName: “真の姿”となる前に── 少しばかり予行演習（デモンストレーション）と行こうか！
jpnSearchText:
“真の姿”となる前に──
少しばかり予行演習（デモンストレーション）と行こうか！

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: ぐっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……！

engChrName: Heheh... Ahahahahahaha!
engSearchText: Heheh... Ahahahahahaha!
jpnChrName: ククク── ハハハハハハハハハハハ！！
jpnSearchText:
ククク──
ハハハハハハハハハハハ！！
……あ………

engChrName: A malevolent god...
engSearchText: A malevolent god...
jpnChrName: “魔神（シャイターン）”………
jpnSearchText: “魔神（シャイターン）”………

engChrName: Just like the Tyrant... No, this thing's on a whole other level!
engSearchText:
Just like the Tyrant... No, this thing's on a whole
other level!
jpnChrName: 大君……いやそれを超えた……
jpnSearchText: 大君……いやそれを超えた……

engChrName: Aaaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaaah!
jpnChrName: うわああああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うわああああっ……！？

engChrName: Wh-What IS this?!
engSearchText: Wh-What IS this?!
jpnChrName: こ、このプレッシャーは……！
jpnSearchText: こ、このプレッシャーは……！

engChrName: Ugh... It's overwhelming, is what it is!
engSearchText: Ugh... It's overwhelming, is what it is!
jpnChrName: むうっ、何という霊圧……！
jpnSearchText: むうっ、何という霊圧……！

engChrName: Not bad. Not bad at all.
engSearchText: Not bad. Not bad at all.
jpnChrName: 悪くない……悪くないな……
jpnSearchText: 悪くない……悪くないな……

engChrName: If this is merely a taste of the power I will soon wield, then I cannot wait to see what I can do once the core is whole.
engSearchText:
If this is merely a taste of the power I will soon wield,
then I cannot wait to see what I can do once the core
is whole.
jpnChrName: この段階でここまで行くなら “真の姿”となったらどこまで……
jpnSearchText:
この段階でここまで行くなら
“真の姿”となったらどこまで……

engChrName: Heheh... Even the society's strongest Enforcer will be nothing more than an ant at my feet.
engSearchText:
Heheh... Even the society's strongest Enforcer will be
nothing more than an ant at my feet.
jpnChrName: クク……噂の結社の “最強”すら余裕で上回るだろう。
jpnSearchText:
クク……噂の結社の
“最強”すら余裕で上回るだろう。

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnSearchText: む……

engChrName: Haaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: おおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおっ……！

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん──！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん──！

engChrName: Are you gonna call on the Grendel?!
engSearchText: Are you gonna call on the Grendel?!
jpnChrName: グレンデルを……！？
jpnSearchText: グレンデルを……！？

engChrName: B-But Mare is not here to assist...
engSearchText: B-But Mare is not here to assist...
jpnChrName: で、ですがあの《メア》がいない状況では……！
jpnSearchText: で、ですがあの《メア》がいない状況では……！

engChrName: Oh, I don't think she's gone anywhere. She's probably just slackin' off and takin' a nap.
engSearchText:
Oh, I don't think she's gone anywhere. She's probably
just slackin' off and takin' a nap.
jpnChrName: いや──おそらくサボって 惰眠を貪ってるだけだろ……
jpnSearchText:
いや──おそらくサボって
惰眠を貪ってるだけだろ……

engChrName: Get your ass outta bed, Mare-Bear!
engSearchText: Get your ass outta bed, Mare-Bear!
jpnChrName: メア公──いい加減起きやがれ！
jpnSearchText: メア公──いい加減起きやがれ！

engChrName: Stop bein' a lazy bum and do your damn job!
engSearchText: Stop bein' a lazy bum and do your damn job!
jpnChrName: 今こそ、お前の出番だろうが！
jpnSearchText: 今こそ、お前の出番だろうが！

engChrName: Ugh. You didn't have to make such a racket. And for the last stinkin' time, stop calling me Mare-Bear.
engSearchText:
Ugh. You didn't have to make such a racket. And for
the last stinkin' time, stop calling me Mare-Bear.
jpnChrName: ……うるさいわね……… 公とか呼ぶんじゃないわよ……
jpnSearchText:
……うるさいわね………
公とか呼ぶんじゃないわよ……

engChrName: Mare!
engSearchText: Mare!
jpnChrName: メアちゃん……！
jpnSearchText: メアちゃん……！

engChrName: Sh-She woke up...
engSearchText: Sh-She woke up...
jpnChrName: め、目を覚ましたの！？
jpnSearchText: め、目を覚ましたの！？

engChrName: What're you talking about? I was awake this whole time. I've just been kinda out of it while I was repairing myself.
engSearchText:
What're you talking about? I was awake this
whole time. I've just been kinda out of it while I was
repairing myself.
jpnChrName: フン、ずっと起きてたわ…… 修復処理で半覚醒モードだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ずっと起きてたわ……
修復処理で半覚醒モードだったけど。

engChrName: So that's what you're up against. You've come a long way.
engSearchText:
So that's what you're up against. You've come a
long way.
jpnChrName: そう…… そこまで来ちゃったのね。
jpnSearchText:
そう……
そこまで来ちゃったのね。

engChrName: Still can't remember who you really are, but I do know the role you've always fulfilled.
engSearchText:
Still can't remember who you really are, but I do
know the role you've always fulfilled.
jpnChrName: お前の正体はまだ思い出せねぇが 果たしてきた役割は分かる……
jpnSearchText:
お前の正体はまだ思い出せねぇが
果たしてきた役割は分かる……

engChrName: So like I said earlier, I need you to do your damn job.
engSearchText: So like I said earlier, I need you to do your damn job.
jpnChrName: とっとと“仕事”をしてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: とっとと“仕事”をしてもらおうか。

engChrName: Sure, I can do that...but is that really what you want?
engSearchText: Sure, I can do that...but is that really what you want?
jpnChrName: ま、いいけど。 ……一応聞くけど、いいのね？
jpnSearchText:
ま、いいけど。
……一応聞くけど、いいのね？

engChrName: Yeah. It's exactly what I want.
engSearchText: Yeah. It's exactly what I want.
jpnChrName: ああ──勿論だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──勿論だ。

engChrName: W-Wait a moment... What're you doing?
engSearchText: W-Wait a moment... What're you doing?
jpnChrName: ま、待ってください２人とも……！
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってください２人とも……！

engChrName: Did you say 'role'? What does that mean?
engSearchText: Did you say 'role'? What does that mean?
jpnChrName: 役割って…… ……それにどうしてそんな……！
jpnSearchText:
役割って……
……それにどうしてそんな……！

engChrName: So pretty...
engSearchText: So pretty...
jpnSearchText: ………綺麗…………

engChrName: Van... No...
engSearchText: Van... No...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、さん………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、さん………

engChrName: Hahaha... I see. It all makes sense now.
engSearchText: Hahaha... I see. It all makes sense now.
jpnChrName: ッ……ハハ…… なるほど……そういう事か……
jpnSearchText:
ッ……ハハ……
なるほど……そういう事か……

engChrName: Admittedly, I cannot tell whether this is resonance or Gnosis at work, but either way, I'm quite surprised.
engSearchText:
Admittedly, I cannot tell whether this is resonance or
Gnosis at work, but either way, I'm quite surprised.
jpnChrName: 共鳴のせいかグノーシスか…… そういうカラクリだったとはな……
jpnSearchText:
共鳴のせいかグノーシスか……
そういうカラクリだったとはな……

engChrName: Heh. So that's what kinda drug that was. Interesting.
engSearchText: Heh. So that's what kinda drug that was. Interesting.
jpnChrName: ハン、やっぱりあのドラッグは そっち系だったか……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、やっぱりあのドラッグは
そっち系だったか……

engChrName: Well, whatever. It's about time we wrapped this up.
engSearchText: Well, whatever. It's about time we wrapped this up.
jpnChrName: まあいい、これにて仕舞いだ。
jpnSearchText: まあいい、これにて仕舞いだ。

engChrName: I'm kinda curious to see which of us befits it the most. How about we go toe to toe and find out?
engSearchText:
I'm kinda curious to see which of us befits it the most.
How about we go toe to toe and find out?
jpnChrName: 決着を付けるとしようぜ── 俺とアンタのどちらが相応しいかを。
jpnSearchText:
決着を付けるとしようぜ──
俺とアンタのどちらが相応しいかを。

engChrName: Very well! Have it your way!
engSearchText: Very well! Have it your way!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、いいだろう！！
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、いいだろう！！

engChrName: I will gladly devour both you and your restraints. You have sealed your fate, Van Arkride!
engSearchText:
I will gladly devour both you and your restraints.
You have sealed your fate, Van Arkride!
jpnChrName: 無様な“枷”ごと喰らい尽くしてやろう── ヴァン・アークライド！！！
jpnSearchText:
無様な“枷”ごと喰らい尽くしてやろう──
ヴァン・アークライド！！！

engChrName: Nah. You sealed yours when you stole my shit. And I'm about to take it back!
engSearchText:
Nah. You sealed yours when you stole my shit.
And I'm about to take it back!
jpnChrName: 預けていたのを返してもらうぜ── ジェラール・ダンテス！！！
jpnSearchText:
預けていたのを返してもらうぜ──
ジェラール・ダンテス！！！

engChrName: AAAAAAAAARGH!
engSearchText: AAAAAAAAARGH!

engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Thank goodness... It's finally over...
engSearchText: Thank goodness... It's finally over...
jpnChrName: よかった……これで……
jpnSearchText: よかった……これで……

engChrName: Hahaha... I was so close...
engSearchText: Hahaha... I was so close...
jpnChrName: ……ククク………… あと一歩の所だったが………
jpnSearchText:
……ククク…………
あと一歩の所だったが………

engChrName: Now that I have been parted from that monstrosity, I finally understand just how abominable it truly is.
engSearchText:
Now that I have been parted from that monstrosity, I
finally understand just how abominable it truly is.
jpnChrName: こうして手放してみると……… ……如何におぞましかったか分かる……
jpnSearchText:
こうして手放してみると………
……如何におぞましかったか分かる……

engChrName: I'll bet. No human should ever have this thing.
engSearchText: I'll bet. No human should ever have this thing.
jpnChrName: ああ……人には過ぎたモンだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……人には過ぎたモンだ。

engChrName: But I'm not gonna apologize to you ever again.
engSearchText: But I'm not gonna apologize to you ever again.
jpnChrName: ──だが悪かったとは、 もう言わないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──だが悪かったとは、
もう言わないぜ。

engChrName: Rightfully so. I have always acted in accordance to my own way of living—just as you do.
engSearchText:
Rightfully so. I have always acted in accordance to my
own way of living—just as you do.

jpnSearchText:
当然だ……貴様と同じく
俺は俺の流儀を貫いただけ……

engSearchText:
You may have won this fight, but my ultimate desire
will still be realized—by your hands.
jpnChrName: ──そして俺の望みは 貴様が代わりに果たすのだから……
jpnSearchText:
──そして俺の望みは
貴様が代わりに果たすのだから……
な……！？

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnSearchText: ………やはり…………

engChrName: I already know for a fact that Gehenna does not exist.
engSearchText: I already know for a fact that Gehenna does not exist.

jpnSearchText:
俺はもう識（し）っている……
“煉獄”すら存在しない事も……

engChrName: But I'll still leave you with these parting words:
engSearchText: But I'll still leave you with these parting words:
jpnChrName: だが敢えてこの言葉を贈ろう……
jpnSearchText: だが敢えてこの言葉を贈ろう……

engChrName: I will be watching you from its depths, Van Arkride.
engSearchText: I will be watching you from its depths, Van Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──煉獄より見守っているぞ、 ヴァン・アークライド……
jpnSearchText:
──煉獄より見守っているぞ、
ヴァン・アークライド……

engChrName: It won't be long...until you become the living embodiment of fear itself.
engSearchText:
It won't be long...until you become the living
embodiment of fear itself.

jpnSearchText:
貴様が“純粋なる恐怖”として
完成するのをな…………

engChrName: Wait a second... What did he mean?!
engSearchText: Wait a second... What did he mean?!
jpnChrName: ちょっと……ちょっと待ってよ……
jpnSearchText: ちょっと……ちょっと待ってよ……

engChrName: Van! Throw that damn thing away, NOW!
engSearchText: Van! Throw that damn thing away, NOW!
jpnChrName: ヴァン……！ いいからそいつを放しやがれッ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……！
いいからそいつを放しやがれッ！

engChrName: Too late. I've got no choice but to return it to where it belongs.
engSearchText:
Too late. I've got no choice but to return it to where
it belongs.

jpnSearchText:
無駄だ──こうなった以上、
在るべきところに戻すしかねぇ。

engChrName: It...vanished?
engSearchText: It...vanished?
jpnSearchText: ……消え、た………？

engChrName: No. It simply returned to Mr. Arkride...
engSearchText: No. It simply returned to Mr. Arkride...

jpnSearchText:
いいえ……
ヴァン様のもとへ……
………………………………
………あ………………

engSearchText:
\\u3000 Sorry to spring this on you, Agnès,
but I'm not gonna be able to finish your request.

jpnSearchText:
悪いな……依頼を途中で
放り出すことになっちまって。

Though I doubt you'll need me. With all of you on the case,
you'll find the last Genesis in no time.

…………！！！
───ぁ─────

That's one of the five who leads the seventy-seven devils.

──《漂泊の魔王（ヴァグランツ＝ザイオン）》……

それじゃあな──
